mapper.sql: id, name, type, time, disease_id, equipment_id, gender_preference, suitable_age_id, practice_number, notice, course_description, video_url
mapper.insert:
insert into t_course
id,
name,
type,
time,
disease_id,
equipment_id,
gender_preference,
suitable_age_id,
practice_number,
notice,
course_description,
video_url,

mapper.update:
update t_course
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
disease_id = #{diseaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender_preference = #{genderPreference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
suitable_age_id = #{suitableAgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
practice_number = #{practiceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_description = #{courseDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_course set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, disease_id = #{diseaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender_preference = #{genderPreference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suitable_age_id = #{suitableAgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, practice_number = #{practiceNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_description = #{courseDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_url = #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_course where name = #{courseName}
select * from t_course where name like '%${courseName}%'
select * from t_course where type like '%${courseType}%'

select
id,video_url from t_course where id = #{id}
